company_locations_country_check.name: company_locations_country_check
company_locations_country_check.value: country IS NOT NULL AND length(country) > 0

products_stock_levels_check.name: products_stock_levels_check
products_stock_levels_check.value: min_stock_level >= 0 AND (max_stock_level IS NULL OR max_stock_level >= min_stock_level)

role_module_permissions_scope_required_c.name: role_module_permissions_scope_required_check
role_module_permissions_scope_required_c.value: workspace_id IS NOT NULL OR company_id IS NOT NULL
